summary: The diff evidence is truncated for SessionPage.tsx, so the header-specific changes required by REQ-5/REQ-6 cannot be fully verified from the provided snippet. However, the provided file summary text claims additional non-header layout changes in SessionPage.tsx that appear out of scope vs the BuildRequest constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Non-header layout changes in SessionPage.tsx: adding a "dynamic viewport height container" and "fixed-height chat areas" adjustments (potentially affecting main content/chat layout beyond the <header>).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints require applying changes ONLY to the SessionPage <header> markup/styles; altering the page container/chat area layout is outside scope and may also risk impacting chat scrolling/auto-scroll behavior (explicit non-goal).
